Notes: "if the agent is connected to many others by relatively few steps (i.e. a low average shortest path length), then its effective population size is large"
Social Structure was found to be more important than population size
In small population, novel complexity fixates easily in line with the strength of the bias
drift effects and a subsequent loss of complexity take over
loss of complexity unless there's a strong anti simplicity bias
high levels of complexity innovation have the paradoxical effect of leading to a collapse in complexity unless the simplicity bias is strong
